thread.title: Walter Schneider

author: Walter Schneider
title: Walter Schneider
text: This is my first and certainly not last purchase from Biblio. I was searching for a book from my childhood, a book that inspired me to earn a degree in History. I searched for it and found an original first edition in pristine shape. Everything was just as described and could not have gone better. Thank you again and please thank the bookstore I purchase this from.
